sourcesContent:
/** * 订单记录Tab页面 * 显示用户的历史订单记录 */ import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody, Button, Chip, Input } from '@heroui/react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FileText, Search, Calendar, CreditCard, CheckCircle, Clock, XCircle, RefreshCw } from 'lucide-react'; export const OrderHistoryTab: React.FC = () => { // 示例订单数据 const orders = [ { id: 'ORD-2024-001', date: '2024-01-20', type: '专业版套餐', amount: '¥99.00', status: 'completed', statusText: '已完成', paymentMethod: '微信支付' }, { id: 'ORD-2024-002', date: '2024-01-15', type: '基础版套餐', amount: '¥29.00', status: 'completed', statusText: '已完成', paymentMethod: '支付宝' }, { id: 'ORD-2024-003', date: '2024-01-10', type: '企业版套餐', amount: '¥299.00', status: 'pending', statusText: '处理中', paymentMethod: '银行卡' }, { id: 'ORD-2024-004', date: '2024-01-05', type: '专业版续费', amount: '¥99.00', status: 'failed', statusText: '已取消', paymentMethod: '微信支付' } ]; // 获取状态样式 const getStatusConfig = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'completed': return { color: 'success' as const, icon: CheckCircle }; case 'pending': return { color: 'warning' as const, icon: Clock }; case 'failed': return { color: 'danger' as const, icon: XCircle }; default: return { color: 'default' as const, icon: RefreshCw }; } }; return ( {/* 页面标题 */}

订单记录

查看您的历史订单和交易记录

{/* 筛选工具栏 */}
} variant="bordered" />
{/* 订单统计 */}
24
总订单数
22
已完成
1
处理中
1
已取消
{/* 订单列表 */}
{orders.map((order, index) => { const statusConfig = getStatusConfig(order.status); const StatusIcon = statusConfig.icon; return (
{/* 订单基本信息 */}

{order.id}

} > {order.statusText}
{order.date}
{order.paymentMethod}
{order.type}
{/* 金额和操作 */}
{order.amount}
{order.status === 'completed' && ( )}
); })}
{/* 分页 */}
{/* 占位提示 */}

更多订单功能正在完善中...

 ); };
